name: Everything But The Rain
description:
Everything But The Rain is an experimental audio game in which you rotate your umbrella to splash water on people talking around you so that they would leave and shut up for good. 

How to Play: 

To splash water on people talking to your right, rotate your umbrella to the right by pressing the top row of letter keys in the order from left to right(“qwertyuiop”) and the bottom row of letter keys in the order from right to left(“/.,mnbvcxz”). 

On the other hand, to splash water on people talking to your left, rotate your umbrella to the left by pressing the top row of letter keys in the order from right to left(“poiuytrewq”) and the bottom row of letter keys in the order from left to right(“zxcvbnm,./”). 

Keep pressing the keys in corresponding order to get rid of people talking in that direction.
